biotools.summary: Comprehensive toolbox for interactively analyzing microbiome data. It can perform taxonomic analysis using the NCBI taxonomy. Perform functional analysis using InterPro2GO, SEED, eggNOG or KEGG. Make bar chartsm word clouds, Coronoi tree maps and other charts. Perform PCoA, clustering and networks.

bioschemas.name: MEGAN6
